Pre-Game Insights: The West Indies team, with a rich history in T20 cricket, is set to face Papua New Guinea, a team eager to prove itself on the big stage.
Both teams are geared up for a competitive encounter under the lights.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The toss of the ICC T20 World Cup 2024 match between West Indies and Papua New Guinea will take place at 07:30 pm IST.
